The fact: checker is Africa Check, an independent and non-partisan organization that assesses claims made in the public arena.
Africa Check employs journalistic skills: readers, public sources, and experts to assess the authenticity of claims.
The claim was rated as false by the fact: checker, indicating that it did not meet the standards of accuracy and truthfulness.
Africa Check is a partner in Meta: s third-party fact-checking program, which aims to stop the spread of false information on social media platforms like Facebook and Instagram.
